title: Cabbage
summaries: The Cabbage is a pet-summoning item that summons a Pet Guinea Pig which follows the player around. If the player is too far away, the Guinea Pig will start flying to catch up with the player, and when flying it will occasionally leaves white clouds behind itself.
It is an uncommon drop from <linked>Dragon Snatchers</linked>. It can also rarely be obtained from <linked>Chests</linked> and <linked>Gold Chests</linked>.
